data.englishTranslation: 1. Spit to your left. (Three times) 2. Seek refuge in Allah from the Devil and from the evil of what you have seen. (Three times) 3. Do not speak about it to anyone. 4. Turn over on your other side.
data.arabicVerse:
يَنْفُثُ عَن يَسَارِهِ (ثَلاثاً).
يَسْتَعِيْذُ بِااللهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطَانِ، وَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا رَأَى (ثَلاثَ مَرَّاتٍ).
لَا يُحَدِّثُ بِهَا أحَداً.
يتحَوَّلُ عَنْ جَنْبِهِ الَّذِي كَانَ عَلَيْهِ

data.englishTranslation: 5. Get up and pray if you desire to do so.
